description: Input Fields allow users to enter freeform text. Variations on this field often provide specific data entry formats such as masked data (e.g. passwords or phone numbers), date and time, and numeric data entry.
heading: Input Field

description: Action Buttons allow users to trigger actions by clicking, tapping, or pressing a corresponding key on a keyboard, such as the “Enter” key.
heading: Button

description: A Slider allows users to choose from a range of continuous and discrete values arranged from minimum to maximum.
heading: Slider

description: This is the nav for the nav example
heading: Secondary Nav Example
